        public static boolean isConnected(android.content.Context context)
        Checks for connectivity.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context.
        Returns:
        true if connected to a network; false if there is no connectivity.

      • getActiveNetworkType

        public static java.lang.String getActiveNetworkType(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the type of the currently active connection.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context.
        Returns:
        The active network type; or NETWORK_TYPE_NONE if there is no active network.

      • getNetworkOperatorName

        public static java.lang.String getNetworkOperatorName(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the network operator name.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context.
        Returns:
        the network operator name; or NETWORK_OPERATOR_NONE if there is no network operator.
